code: import React,{useRef,useEffect}from"react";import{connect}from"react-redux";var Pitch=function Pitch(props){var container=useRef(null);useEffect(function(){container.current.textContent=props.pitch.toFixed(2);},[container,props.pitch]);return React.createElement("span",{className:"track-bpm-pitch",ref:container});};var mapsStateToProps=function mapsStateToProps(state,ownProps){return{pitch:state.console.channel[ownProps.name].playBackState.pitch};};export default connect(mapsStateToProps)(Pitch);
